item.title: Report X-2024101038
item.description:
Report X-2024101038

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-18T06:17:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-09
  • City: LITTLE ROCK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 1.X-2024101038 RESPONDER WAS CALLED FOR LEAKING PACKAGE BAY# 3 OF THE UNLOAD DURING THE TWILIGHT SORT. LEAKING CORROSIVE HAZ-MAT PACKAGES SITTING ON TRAILER FLOOR. RESPONDER USE DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET FOR CLEAN UP OF HAZMAT. FOLLOWED PROPER PROCESSING AND WORN CORRECT PPE. ALL DAMAGED MERCHANDISE PLACED IN DMN TRAY FOR TRANSPORT TO DMN PROCESSING AREA. 2.X-2024101039 RESPONDER WAS CALLED FOR LEAKING PACKAGE BAY# 3 OF THE UNLOAD DURING THE TWILIGHT SORT. LEAKING CORROSIVE HAZ-MAT PACKAGES SITTING ON TRAILER FLOOR. RESPONDER USE DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET FOR CLEAN UP OF HAZMAT. FOLLOWED PROPER PROCESSING AND WORN CORRECT PPE. ALL DAMAGED MERCHANDISE PLACED IN DMN TRAY FOR TRANSPORT TO DMN PROCESSING AREA. 3. X-2024101050 RESPONDER WAS CALLED FOR LEAKING PACKAGE BAY# 3 OF THE UNLOAD. LEAKING CORROSIVE HAZ-MAT PACKAGES. RESPONDER USE DECISION TREE AND RESPONSE SHEET FOR CLEAN UP OF HAZMAT. FOLLOWED PROPER PROCESSING AND WORN CORRECT PPE. ALL DAMAGED MERCHANDISE PLACED IN DMN TRAY FOR TRANSPORT TO DMN PROCESSING AREA.
